items.title: Exclusive: Departing Salesforce CFO Amy Weaver will become the CEO of Direct Relief, the fifth largest charity in the U.S
items.description: Direct Relief managed $2.4 billion in humanitarian aid last year.

items.title: Another Tesla insider is selling shares as carmaker’s CFO joins board chair in unloading stock
items.description: At a time when sentiment in the stock is at its most vulnerable in months, Taneja deliberately chose to cash in more of his shares.

items.title: How the CEO of McLaren turned around a losing team by focusing on a work culture shift
The spectacular Synapse collapse: The ugliest divorce in fintech left $200 million in customer money frozen—and shows the risks of financial apps
items.description: Is the failure of this buzzy startup a canary in the coal mine for bigger problems in fintech?

items.title: These are Elon Musk’s top lieutenants—including at DOGE
items.description: Musk relies on a small number of executives to help him lead his six companies—and cut government spending.
